abstract: German Chancellor Angela Merkel appears to defy her detractors as she helps lead the nations of the euro currency zone to the most comprehensive deal yet to prop up the ailing shared currency, defend heavily indebted member states and protect the Continent's shaky financial system.
snippet: Angela Merkel, the chancellor of Germany, appeared to defy her detractors as she helped lead the nations of the euro currency zone to the most comprehensive deal yet.
lead_paragraph: Angela Merkel, the chancellor of Germany, appeared to defy her detractors as she helped lead the nations of the euro currency zone to the most comprehensive deal yet.

headline.main: German Leader Seizes Initiative and Confounds Her Critics
headline.print_headline: German Leader Seizes Initiative and Confounds Her Critics
headline.seo: In Debt Deal, Merkel Seizes Initiative and Confounds Critics
